tweet: We have just released IRI 1.8.5 with changes to bundle validation logic. This unifies the logic across #node implementations. You can get the release at  https://t.co/nUUg7VuaKM   #IOTA

The presentations from the #VDFDay at @Stanford are publicly available on the VDF Alliance channel on YouTube. Luigi Vigneri & Vassil Dimitrov, from our Research Department, explain the #IOTA technology and the current work of the Research Team:  https://t.co/n8ntMnu4qB

The #TechCommunity will explore solutions to fight Covid-19 in the #weagainstthevirus hackathon by @HackTheAlps. Antonio Nardella, our community manager, is one of the mentors. Next weekend, March 28th | 29th. Participate at  https://t.co/ixQ9zhygoX #IOTA @antonionardella

"People are not focused on innovating anymore – it´s all about making money instead. ... We should focus on where we can apply this technology, in industry or elsewhere, to really solve problems." #IOTA  https://t.co/r0LUPyAzeP
Only 380 Likes? You can do more #IOTA community! That would be a great usecase to show the possibilities of #IOTA to the world! => Government FOMO soon!   https://t.co/ajAdrBX6AR

#IOTACommunity it's time to show our support to:  @huhn @mrCryptec @bohl_oliver   and the whole team of  @CovidTrack   with their projects that showcase the #IOTA Tangle technology.  Go and vote for these great IOTA Community projects!   https://t.co/hZnxBpda81

Unfortunately we still don't have enough orders, to start the production. Please help us to make the first English version of the #einfachIOTA Magazin a reality!  We put so much #IOTALove in it, but without enough #IOTA, we won't be able to finance it.    https://t.co/d9GopHC8do  https://t.co/o7tNIUCjSv

No quarantine can stop IOTA Argentina community from discussing #IOTA status! Join us this Thursday in our @IotaArgentina virtual Meetup to discuss in spanish what is going in the IOTA world! #StayHome  https://t.co/clj7ZdasRR  https://t.co/CgYHY4qPNA
